subject: Re: [junit] Error in Instalation?
msgSnippet: ... The samples are not in junit.jar. You need to add the folder containing junit/samples to your class path. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
A wrote:

> How do I install it properly? I set the path and everything but every
> time I run the sample tests I get the error: Class not
> found "junit.samples.AllTests"

The samples are not in junit.jar. You need to add the folder containing
junit/samples to your class path.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
